Text_x:
Had a discussion in #climatebrawl about infamous '82 Exxon climate change prediction.
Using 1960 as their start datum, they predicted an upper bound of 3.1¬∞C per 2x of CO2 & lower bound of 1.3¬∞.
Comparing it to NASA's GISTEMP4.0 data, it's almost perfect! (.98 vs measured .96) https://t.co/leNWUAGGgD
Text_y:
Had a discussion in #climatebrawl about infamous '82 Exxon climate change prediction.
Using 1960 as their start datum, they predicted an upper bound of 3.1¬∞C per 2x of CO2 & lower bound of 1.3¬∞.
Comparing it to NASA's GISTEMP4.0 data, it's almost perfect! (.98 vs measured .96) https://t.co/leNWUAGGgD
